subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Since 1918, at least 11 pitchers who primarily throw knuckleballs have allowed zero hits or one hit in a complete game. An eclectic bunch, they have a history as colorful as the knuckleball.
snippet: Since 1918, at least 11 pitchers who primarily throw knuckleballs have allowed zero hits or one hit in a complete game. An eclectic bunch, they have a history as colorful as the knuckleball.
